meanings.definition: Feeding on many different kinds of food.
meanings.sent1: The polyphagous caterpillar happily munched on leaves, fruits, and even flowers.
meanings.sent2: The polyphagous bird enjoyed a meal of seeds, insects, and berries.
meanings.sent3: The polyphagous squirrel was like a food connoisseur, trying a bit of everything in the forest.
meanings.sent4: Her polyphagous appetite was like a bottomless pit, always craving new flavors.
meanings.sent5: The polyphagous bear's diet was as diverse as a buffet, never sticking to just one type of food.

meanings.definition: Able to eat a variety of foods.
meanings.sent1: Being polyphagous, the animal could switch between meat and plants for sustenance.
meanings.sent2: The polyphagous pet happily devoured both wet and dry food without any issues.
meanings.sent3: The polyphagous child's lunchbox was like a treasure trove of different snacks every day.
meanings.sent4: Her polyphagous nature made her the perfect dinner guest, always appreciating the diverse menu.
meanings.sent5: The polyphagous insect's ability to consume various foods was like a superpower in the garden.
